Welcome to my professional website!

I am a postdoctoral researcher at the [Department of Physics and Astronomy](https://physics-astronomy.exeter.ac.uk/) at the University of Exeter.
I study chemical processes in the atmospheres of hydrogen-dominated gas giant exoplanets using 3D chemistry-climate models and JWST data.
